title: Venue Information
description: PARIS 2025 will take place at Salle St Nicolas, a beautiful venue in Issy-les-Moulineaux, just outside Paris.

transport.title: From Paris and the Ile-de-France region
transport.corentin: Stop Corentin Celton - Metro line 12, bus 126, bus 189, bus 394
transport.mairie: Mairie d'Issy stop - Metro line 12, bus 190, bus 123, bus 169, bus 290 and bus 323
transport.freres: Stop Issy - fr√®res Voisin bus 39 and bus 169
transport.walk10: 10 minutes on foot or 5 minutes by metro
transport.porte: Stop Porte de Versailles - Tram T3a, Tram T2, Metro line 12, bus 80
transport.walk15: 15 minutes on foot or 10 minutes by bus
transport.rer: RER C Issy-Val-de-Seine, Tram T2, bus 189, bus 290, bus 323 and bus 394
